I agree to the above statement

The contributors to and developers of this application have taken reasonable steps to provide accurate and reliable information for this application. However, there is no assurance or guarantee that the statements contained in this application are correct, precise, or up-to-date. The application was created by individuals that are not professionals and the application is for informational purposes only. The information is provided “as is” with no warranties of any kind, express or implied.

 This application is intended to be used as a self-help tool for adults, and is not designed to be therapeutic or provide psychological, psychiatric or medical advice. By using this application, you acknowledge that the application is not a diagnostic instrument and that you are 18 years or older. You are encouraged to share your results with a physician or other healthcare provider.

 The application is not an exhaustive collection of information available to a given individual for a given behavioral health problem, nor as an endorsement of specific treatments or services. Nothing on the application should be construed as an attempt to offer or render a medical or mental health opinion or otherwise engage in the practice of medicine or psychology. The information provided is, at best, of a general nature and cannot substitute for the advice of, diagnosis or treatment of a psychological, psychiatric or medical professional.

 Even if a statement about medicine is accurate, it may not apply to you or your symptoms. Please take all steps necessary to ascertain that information you receive from this application is correct and has been verified. For an accurate diagnosis of a mental health disorder, you should seek an evaluation from a qualified mental health professional. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on this application. If you feel you may have a medical or mental health emergency, call your doctor or 911 immediately.

 Reliance upon any information provided by this application is solely at the users own risk. Some information on this application may create an unreasonable risk for readers who choose to apply or use the information in their own activities or to promote the information for use by third parties. The individual contributors and developers of this application disclaim any liability, loss or risk sustained as a result or consequence of any attempt to use, apply or adopt any of the information provided by this application.

 All data stored by this application is saved to your phone. The contributors to and developers of this application have no access to the data stored on your phone and cannot use, store, manipulate, or otherwise interact with data on your phone, and disclaim any responsibility to react or respond to any data stored by this application.
